title: Zorin OS 16.3 Released with New Upgrade Utility, Zorin Connect Improvements
description:
Zorin OS 16.3 distribution is now available for download based on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS and featuring a new upgrade utility that lets users upgrade from previous Zorin OS 16 releases.

The post Zorin OS 16.3 Released with New Upgrade Utility, Zorin Connect Improvements appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
